curriculumOverviewContent.heading: Programs Offered
curriculumOverviewContent.intro: Candelaria Institute offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to develop both academic skills and technical expertise across its educational levels—Basic Education, College Department, and Technical-Vocational Education and Training (TVET).

items.title: Basic Education Program
items.description: Our Basic Education program spans from Elementary to Secondary education, providing students with a strong academic foundation and emphasizing values education and joyful learning.

bullets.title: Elementary (Nursery to Grade 6):
bullets.detail: A warm, nurturing environment where young minds are shaped with strong academic foundations, values education, and joyful learning. We spark curiosity, build confidence, and develop good character early on.

items.title: Junior High School Program (Grades 7-10)
items.description: Where learners grow into critical thinkers and responsible citizens. Our well-rounded curriculum strengthens their academic core, leadership skills, and moral values — preparing them for real-world challenges and future learning paths.

items.title: Senior High School Program (Grades 11-12)
items.description: Get future-ready with our specialized tracks that match your goals, interests, and career dreams!

bullets.title: ABM (Accountancy, Business, and Management):
bullets.detail: Learn the skills to lead in the world of business — from entrepreneurship to finance and management strategies.

bullets.title: HUMSS (Humanities and Social Sciences):
bullets.detail: Explore society, culture, and communication. Perfect for future educators, writers, social workers, and community leaders.

bullets.title: STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics):
bullets.detail: Dive into innovation! Build a strong foundation in science and math, ideal for aspiring doctors, engineers, and tech experts.

bullets.title: Tech-Voc Tracks:
bullets.detail: Hands-on learning with practical skills for the real world. Includes Bread and Pastry Production, Food and Beverage Services, Computer Systems Servicing, and Shielded Metal Arc Welding.

items.title: College Department
items.description: Become a beacon of knowledge and inspiration! Our Bachelor of Secondary Education (BSEd) program shapes passionate future educators equipped to teach and lead in today’s evolving classrooms.

bullets.title: Bachelor of Secondary Education (BSEd):
bullets.detail: Majors in English and Social Studies, preparing students for secondary education teaching roles. Recognized by the government since 2014.

items.title: TVET Programs
items.description: Skill up. Stand out. Start your career with our TESDA-approved programs, designed to equip students with the practical skills and certifications needed for various industries.

bullets.title: Driving NC II:
bullets.detail: Gain the confidence and certification to drive professionally with safety and responsibility.

bullets.title: SMAW NC I & NC II:
bullets.detail: Train in essential welding techniques — your gateway to high-demand careers in the metal and construction industry.

bullets.title: Computer Systems Servicing NC II:
bullets.detail: Launch your tech career with skills in hardware, software, and network troubleshooting.

bullets.title: Bread and Pastry Production NC II:
bullets.detail: Turn your passion into a profession with hands-on bakery training and culinary techniques.

bullets.title: Bookkeeping NC III:
bullets.detail: Master the language of business through financial reporting, accounting systems, and taxation knowledge.

callToActionContent.heading: Experience Our Curriculum in Action
callToActionContent.description: We invite you to visit our campus and see our curriculum in action. Schedule a tour or attend an open house to learn more about how Candelaria Institute of technology can provide your child with an exceptional education.
